arch_conf.name: Description
arch_conf.value: RISC-V is an instruction set architecture (ISA) based on the RISC type and its hardware is free. This architecture was created in 2010 at the University of California, Berkeley.

instructions.name: lbu
lhu
lw
instructions.definition:
var addr = capi_int2uint(rs1)+imm;
 rd = capi_mem_read(addr, 'w', rd_name);

instructions.name: jal
sra
instructions.definition: const temp = BigInt.asIntN(32, BigInt(rs1)) >> BigInt(rs2); rd = capi_int2uint(temp)

instructions.name: ecall
ebreak
instructions.definition:
console.log('Not implemented: ebreak');
 capi_raise('ebreak not implemented');

instructions.name: fence.i
instructions.definition:
console.log('Not implemented: fence.i');
 capi_raise('fence.i not implemented');

instructions.name: div
divu
mulh
instructions.definition: rd = BigInt.asIntN(32, (BigInt.asIntN(64, BigInt.asIntN(32, BigInt(rs1)) * BigInt.asIntN(32, BigInt(rs2))) >> 32n));

instructions.name: mulhsu
instructions.definition: rd = BigInt.asIntN(32, (BigInt.asIntN(64, BigInt.asIntN(32, BigInt(rs1)) * BigInt.asUintN(32, BigInt(rs2))) >> 32n))

instructions.name: mulhu
instructions.definition: rd = BigInt.asIntN(32, (BigInt.asUintN(64, BigInt.asUintN(32, BigInt(rs1)) * BigInt.asUintN(32, BigInt(rs2))) >> 32n));

instructions.name: fclass.s
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,9), 2), parseInt(a.slice(10), 2));

instructions.name: fdiv.s
fdiv.s
fsgnjx.s
instructions.definition:
let a = rs1<0; let b = rs2<0;
rd = (a^b) ? -Math.abs(rs1) : Math.abs(rs1);

instructions.name: fsw
instructions.definition:
var val1 = capi_float322uint(rs2);
 capi_mem_write(rs1+imm, val1, 'w', rs2_name);

fclass.d
instructions.definition:
let a = capi_float2bin(rs1);
rd=capi_check_ieee(parseInt(a[0]), parseInt(a.slice(1,12), 2), parseInt(a.slice(13), 2));
